title: #450 Spade! Damon! Garfield!
description:
It's a hot, hot ep as Mark and Joe recap their performance for Matt Damon! Joe's new special "This Year's Material" is released on Youtube and he talks about his watch party, as Mark encounters one bad hombre! Finally, Mark gets an heartwarming DM from David Spade!

Sponsors:
- Support the show and get 10% off your first month of online therapy at https://BetterHelp.com/Tuesdays
- Support the show and get 15% off your first Raycon order at https://BuyRaycon.com/Tuesdays
- Support the show and get 3 months free by visiting https://ExpressVPN.com/Tuesdays
- Support the show and get 20% off your first order by visiting https://NativeDeo.com/tuesdayswithstories

Subscribe to our Patreon for full video of the show A WEEK EARLY, WEEKLY bonus stuff, and more! www.patreon.com/tuesdays
